'''Kemen''' was a [[Númenórean]] noble and the son of [[Ar-Pharazôn|Chancellor Pharazôn]] during the [[Second Age]]. Kemen was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]], and he was portrayed by [[Leon Wadham]].<ref>{{webcite|author=The Lord of the Rings on Prime|articleurl=https://twitter.com/LOTRonPrime/status/1547418271141560321|articlename=Leon Wadham is Kemen. #TheRingsOfPower|dated=14 July 2022|website=[https://twitter.com Twitter]|accessed=19 February 2023}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Kemen'' directly comes from the [[Quenya]] word ''[[kemen]]'' ("earth").
